Text: The David Lynch "Dune" sucks. Nothing beats the television version.

I would argue that the book beats the television version. But I did enjoy the TV version.

This one... eh. It's not a very good version of Dune, but it's worth watching.
Well it's old so it's no big wonder that it looks a bit bad, but it didn't get nominated for those oscars and other awards without reason, not to mention it won one...
Whoever prefer TV CRAP, instead ORIGINAL David Lynch "DUNE" should consider going to specialized facility called School for people with Special Needs (aka. Challenged people)
I always thought this version was really good, more true to the book than Lynch's version. Thanks uploader!
